titles.title: Mäṣḥafä ʾaslәṭi, Lectionary for the entire year

shortcontents.shortcontent:
The Ms. contains only one text: I) Mäṣḥafä ʾAslәṭi, Lectionary for the entire year (fols. 5ra-67ra) I-1) Scriptural readings for liturgical periods, fasts and feasts for the entire year (fols. 5ra-67ra) - Liturgical period Yoḥannәs: fols. 5ra-7va - Feasts of the Martyrs (Sämaʿtat): fols. 7va-8va - Liturgical period Mäsqäl: fols. 25va-27rb - Feasts of the Righteous Ones (Ṣadәqan): fols. 10rb-11va - Liturgical period Ṣәge: fols. 11va-13ra - Feast of the stay of the Holy Family at Mount Qosqam in Egypt and feast of Mary (Qwәsqwam): fols. 13ra-16va - Feast of Archangel Michael (Qәddus Mikaʾel): fols. 16va-18vb - Feast of the harvest (Maʿәrär): fol. 18vb-19vb - Liturgical period Sәbkät: fols. 19vb-21rb - Liturgical period Bәrhan: fols. 21rb-22va - Liturgical period Nolawi: fols. 22va-24ra - Liturgical period Lәdät: fols. 24ra-25va - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 25va-27ra - Feast of the Epiphany (Ṭәmqät): fols. 27ra-29ra - Feasts of the Righteous Ones (Ṣadәqan): fols. 29ra-30va - Feast of Simeon, Presentation of the Lord (Sәmʿon): fols. 30va-34va - Week of Nicodemus (Niqodimos) and feast of the Archangel Gabriel (Qәddus Gäbrәʾel): fols. 34va-36va - Palm Sunday (Hosaʿәna): fols. 36va-38rb - Maundy Thursday (Ṣälotä Ḫamus): fols.38rb-43ra - Vigil of Easter (mäḫatәwa Fasika): fols. 43ra-44va - Easter (Fasika): fols. 44va-47ra - Sunday after Easter (ʾAgbәʾotä Gәbәr or Fäṣṣämnä): fols. 47ra-48va - Pentecost (Ṗänṭäqosṭe or Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 48va-50rb - Ascension (ʿƎrgät): fols. 50rb-51vb - Pentecost (Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 51vb-54ra - Liturgical period Kәrämt (“Rainy season”): fols. 54ra-56rb - Fast of the Apostles (Ḥawaryat): fols. 56rb-57rb - Feasts of the Virgin (Dәngәl): fols. 57rb-59rb - Transfiguration (Däbrä Tabor): fols. 59rb-61ra - Feast of Abraham (ʾAbrәham): fols. 61ra-62vb I-2) Scriptural readings for Hours of Sunday (fols. 62vb-67ra)
Additio 1

dcomments.dcomment: 19th cent. Additio 1 mentions 1937 A.M. (=1944/45 A.D.) as the purchase date of the Ms.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dack-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools are used: straight triple line, double circle, cross hatching, X-form, palme shape).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches through the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – I(8/fols. 5r-12v) – II(8/fols. 13r-20v) – III(8/fols. 21r-28v) – IV(8/fols. 29r-36v) – V(9; s.l. 7, stub after 2/fols. 37r-45v) – VI(8/fols. 46r-53v) – VII(8/fols. 54r-61v) – VIII(6/fols. 62r-67v) – B(2/fols. 68r-69v)

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipit of Text I and its sections; titles of books to be read; abbreviation of the directive yәbәl diyaqon, “the deacon says”; notes written in the upper margins; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numbers. On the incipit page of Texts I (fol. 5r) a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines).

otherdetails.otherdetail: The text is called ʾasәlṭ in the incipit (fol. 5r). The organisation of the text is similar to lectionaries called Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw (cp. Mss. SDGM-007, DMD-012).

additional.det: Crudely written in Amharic with a blue pencil. The date 1937 A.M. (=1944/45 A.D.) is mentioned.

extras.extra: - Hardly readable notes (pen trials?): fols. 68r, 69v. - In fols. 21ra, three last lines of the column are not used.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes written in the upper margin indicate assigned readings for Text I in fols.: ዘዮሐንስ፡ fol. 5ra ዘሰማዕታት፡ fol. 7va ዘመስቀል፡ fol. 25va ዘጻድቃን: fol. 10r ዘጽጌ፡ fol. 11va ዘቍስቋም፡ ወዘበዓለ፡ ማርያም፡ fol. 13ra ዘሚካኤል፡ fol. 16va-19vb ዘማዕረር: fol. 18vb ዘስብከት፡ fol. 19vb ዘርሃን [sic]: fol. 21rb ዘኖላዊ፡ fol. 22va ዘልደት፡ fol. 24ra ዘግዝረት፡ fol. 25va ዘጥምቅት፡ fol. 27ra ዘጻድቃን: fol. 29ra ዘስምዖን፡ fol. 30va Unreadable note: fol. 32va ዘትሰብዕ፡ [sic] Unreadable ፡ fol. 34va ዘሆሳዕና፡ fol. 36va ዘጸሎተ ኃሙስ፡ fol.38rb Unreadable note: fol. 40vb ዘመኃትዋ ፋሲካ፡ fol. 43ra ዘፋሲካ፡ fol. 44va ዘኣግብኦተ ገብር፡ fol. 47ra ዘጰንጠቆስጤ፡ fol. 48va ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 50rb ዘጳራቅሌጦስ፡ fol. 51vb ዘክረምት፡ fol. 54ra ዘሐዋርያት፡ fol. 56rb ዘድንግል፡ fol. 57rb ዘደብረ ታቦር፡ fol. 59rb ዘኣብርሃም፡ fol. 61ra ዘሰነበት ሰዓታት፡ fol. 62vb
